# Journeyman Book of Rul Thaven (Level 9 Diviner)
## Overview
*This medium-sized book has a creased spine and supple gray leather covers. The leather has rubbed away in certain spots, tiny pinhole burns pock the surface, and a brass lock holds the book shut. A woman’s portrait has been bound into the front cover, and text covers almost all of the image except her face: text in circles, with arrows pointing to new circles with suppositions. Underneath the woman’s chin are the words “Diabolist sacrifice?”*

**Protection** Average lock (DC 25), and the 5th-level spells are hidden with *[[Secret Page (Spell)|secret page]]*. The special word is “reveal.”

**Opposition Schools** Illusion, transmutation

**Value** 1,195 gp (2,320 gp with the preparation ritual)

**Spells**

5th—*[[Contact Other Plane (Spell)|contact other plane]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Major Creation (Spell)|major creation]]*, *[[Telepathic Bond (Spell)|telepathic bond]]* <sup>S</sup>,

4th—*[[Detect Scrying (Spell)|detect scrying]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Locate Creature (Spell)|locate creature]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Remove Curse (Spell)|remove curse]]*, *[[Scrying (Spell)|scrying]]* <sup>S</sup>

3rd—*[[Arcane Sight (Spell)|arcane sight]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Clairaudience_Clairvoyance (Spell)|clairaudience/clairvoyance]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Secret Page (Spell)|secret page]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *[[Tongues (Spell)|tongues]]* <sup>S</sup>

2nd—*[[Detect Thoughts (Spell)|detect thoughts]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Flaming Sphere (Spell)|flaming sphere]]*, *[[Locate Object (Spell)|locate object]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Resist Energy (Spell)|resist energy]]*, *[[See Invisibility (Spell)|see invisibility]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Summon Monster II (Spell)|summon monster II]]*

1st—*[[Cause Fear (Spell)|cause fear]]*, *[[Comprehend Languages (Spell)|comprehend languages]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Detect Secret Doors (Spell)|detect secret doors]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Detect Undead (Spell)|detect undead]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Disguise Self (Spell)|disguise self]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *[[Identify (Spell)|identify]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Protection From Evil (Spell)|protection from evil]]*, *[[Protection From Law (Spell)|protection from law]]*, *[[True Strike (Spell)|true strike]]* <sup>S</sup>

**Preparation Ritual**

**Eyes of Rul Thaven (Su)** You use a trick perfected by Rul Thaven to ferret out invisible creatures. Spend this boon’s effect as a swift action. You gain the effects of *[[See Invisibility (Spell)|see invisibility]]* for 1 round.

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 123
